Dialogue: The first time I remember so vividly. A bunch of us kids were at Waxman's Drugstore, when Mr. Waxman, who was a mean old prick, always worrying about us robbing him, dropped a roll of quarters.

Dialogue: Sometimes I tell myself that I didn't have a choice, that stealing was surviving.  Usually I can admit that's bullshit.  I did it because it was a way out.  It was easy and I was good at it, real good.

Dialogue: Where is it?

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: Either pull the trigger or get that thing out of my face.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Stupid cunt!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Caesar, stop acting like an asshole and think --

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Don't try to tell me what to do.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: You need the money just like we do.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Shut up, Violet.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Let us go and we'll make a deal.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Shut the fuck up!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: What did you do to her?!  This isn't my Violet!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: What did she do to you?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Everything you couldn't.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: You ungrateful bitch!  You had nothing before I met you.  You were nothing!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Who gave you this place?  This apartment?

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Who gave us all of this?  I did!  I gave you everything!  I gave you this life!  I made you, Violet.  I saved you.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I saved you.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Ha!  What a load of crap.  Look at yourself, Caesar.  You're a thug. |You launder money for the mob.  You rent women like you rented this apartment.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Saved me?  You don't even know me. You used me, Caesar, just like I used you.  All part of the business.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: You betrayed me!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: You murdered Gino!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I had to.  You made me.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Bullshit, you killed him.  Not me. You did it because you couldn't stand the thought of Johnnie fucking you.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Shut up!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Okay, you want business, I'll give you the fucking business.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I'm going to make you beg just like Shelly did.  Just like Shelly!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I'm sorry, Corky ...

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: Don't be sorry.  Help me.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Oh, no no no.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Hey, Violet, you remember these?

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I'm going to start with her so you'll get a good idea what's coming.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I'm going to ask you where the money is.  Every time you don't give me an answer, I'm going to cut off one finger.

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: When I reach ten, then I'll start with you.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Where is the money?

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: ...  Mickey.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I said where --

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: No!  I'll tell you!

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: It's over there in the empty apartment.

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: I put it inside one of the paint drums.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I promised I would kill you.

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: You can't kill me yet.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Why?

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: I could be lying.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: You're going to wish to God you hadn't done that.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Fuck.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Son of a bitch ...

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Mickey will get in.  I know he will.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Violet.  I can kill you right now if that's what you want.  If you want to live, then you have to help me. I need you to make Mickey believe that everything is normal.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Tell me, do you want to live?

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Good girl.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Jesus Christ!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Holy fuck, Mickey!  You scared the shit outta me.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: What is this?  what are you two doing, sneaking in here with your peckers in your hands?  You gonna do me, Mick?  Is that it?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: No, Cease.  There was no answer.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I thought I heard someone knocking.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: I was buzzing, I was knocking, but I guess you couldn't hear me on account of being in the shower.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Yeah, it was Violet's idea.  I was so wound up about Gino, she was trying to help me relax.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: That Violet is one nice lady.  Wish someone would help me relax.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Shit, Mick, come on in, let me get you a drink.  Sit down, Lou.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: We was worried about you, Cease.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Me?  Why?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: We went over to Johnnie's place just to check it out and it was busted up, Bad.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: I started thinking maybe it's about the money so I call you, but all I get is the busy signal.  I figure the phone is off the hook, that's why I come rushing over here.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Oh Christ, the phone ...  That was a fucking stupid thing to do, wasn't it?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Hey, if Violet was helping me relax, I'd probably do the same thing.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Cease, can I ask you something?

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Why'd you move all the furniture around?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Let me guess.  That was Violet's idea, too.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Actually, yeah, she was nervous about Gino coming, wanted everything to look right.  You know women, Mick.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Sure, Cease.  They make us do stupid things, don't they.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Is that the money?

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Yeah, that's it.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: That fucking Shelly.  I gotta hand it to the guy, but Jesus, if I were him I would have bailed a long time ago.  I mean, how much money does a man need?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: I remember I was just staring at all this goddamn money, Shelly down on his knees, and the next thing I know, Johnnie just blows his head off.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: What a fucking mess.  Johnnie's laughing his ass off and that's when Caesar lost it and - Boom.  He coldcocked him.  Fucking coldcocks Johnnie Marzzone.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Hey, Caesar, where's the key?

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: The key, yeah, the key's in my pants in the bathroom.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Fuck it, I don't need the key.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: I didn't need a key to get in here, did I?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Who the hell could that be?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: You gonna answer it?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Hello, Caesar.  This is Gino.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: You're blowing your only chance. Act like I'm Gino.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Holy shit, I don't believe it!  We've been going crazy over here, Gino!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: It's Gino!  It's Gino!

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Where in the hell is he?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: We were in a car accident --

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: But everybody is all right.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: They're all fine.  Just bruises and shit.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Un-fucking-believable.  I called those highway patrol dumb fucks.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Ssh!  I can't hear Gino!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I'm listening.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I want what's mine, half the money. We get rid of Mickey, no one else dies.  No one.  Say yes, I understand.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Tell them I'm at St. Mary's off the Kennedy, in the waiting room, but stay on the phone until I come out.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: St.  Mary's off the Kennedy, sure. Okay, Gino.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Mickey?  What are you doing here?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Violet, it's Gino and Johnnie.  They were in a car accident.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Oh my God.  Was anyone hurt?

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: I think everything is okay.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: They're at St.  Mary's in the waiting room.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: I can't fit them all in my car so give me your keys.  You drive my car, Lou.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Sure, Mickey, sure.  Violet!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Go grab my car keys from my pants in the bathroom.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Please, help us out, Mickey wants to get going.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: They might want to go straight to the airport and back to Miami, so I better take this.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: You got the key?

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Oh yeah.  Violet!

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Thanks, V.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Call me as soon as you get him.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Leave your phone on the hook.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Now that's teamwork.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I should have let him kill you.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: You know he would have done you, too.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I knew I couldn't trust you.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: I said I'd let you live and I will.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Maybe.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Time to find out if the dyke was stupid enough to lie.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Yes!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Violet!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Fuck!

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Goddammit, Violet!  Stop!  Now!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Come on.  Come on, please.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: Oh, you bitch.  You fucking bitch.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Mickey!  Oh God, Mickey!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: He made me help him, Mickey, God, I was so afraid.  It was Caesar, all Caesar.  You have to help me.  He's coming - Oh God!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Corky?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Corky!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Stop!

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: It's over, Caesar.  I called Mickey. He's on his way.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Get out of here, Caesar.  If you want to live you had better start running.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: All these years and you still don't know me, Violet.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: But I know you.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Caesar, don't.

Speaker: caesar
Dialogue: What are you going to do, V?  Shoot me?  Kill me in cold blood?  I don't think so.  I'll tell you why.  If you had it in you to pull that trigger, you would have done it a long time ago.  If I was you, I would have killed me the minute I brought the money home.  But you didn't and I know why, because you don't want to kill me.  Do you, V?  Do you? No, I know you don't.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Caesar, you don't know shit.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I will never understand it, Mickey. You didn't even call the police.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: I told you, the family doesn't want the police around.  We want to take care of it ourselves and we will. I'll find him.  I swear I will.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I know you will.

Speaker: mickey
Dialogue: Sure you're going to be okay?  I mean, if you're having second thoughts, my offer still stands.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Thanks, Mickey, but I need to get out, you know?  Get away from all of this.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: But thanks.  Thanks for everything.

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: Hey.

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: Hey.

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: How'd it go?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: I'm here, aren't I?

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: I guess we should get out of here.

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: Thought we might need a getaway car.

Speaker: corky
Dialogue: You know what the difference is between us, Violet?

Speaker: violet
Dialogue: No.

Dialogue: ...  Me neither.
